author: Holly Ellyatt
title: Italy could relax lockdown measures within weeks, but much of Europe reels as virus nears peak
description: While Italy looks to have overcome the worst of the coronavirus outbreak in terms of daily infections and deaths, recent hopes of a peak elsewhere in Europe have been dashed in recent days.
content:
Federico Mantova owner of "Donna Gnora" farm, that delivers fruit and vegetables with rowing boats, and David Angeli sail the Grand Canal for the deliveries on April 08, 2020 in Venice, Italy.
Italy could look to ease some of its stringent lockdown restricti… [+4859 chars]
